title: [GAMEPLAY] Blood Moon Kennen has no Joke animation
body:
Bought blood moon Kennen, in game using the joke (could be taunt though) produces no animation. The sound line is played but there is no animation that goes with it.

Nice to get a proper skin for the little guy, just annoying it doesn't quite work.

replies.body:
Hey Dragoshade! 

Thanks for the report! We'll take a look and see what's going on here.

**EDIT**: Looks like Kennen doesn't have an animation for his joke - including the base. This appears to be working as intended.
